lead_paragraph: Padraig Harrington shot a three-under 67 at the Mid-Ocean Club in Tucker’s Town, Bermuda, for a one-shot lead in the PGA Grand Slam of Golf. Ángel Cabrera, the United States Open champion, nearly caught Harrington but his 15-foot eagle putt came up short on the 18th hole, giving him a 68.
